about_the_game:
When the world's smart-devices go rogue, only one extremely petty gal with a laser gun stands in their way. Gain quantum blood, magnetic ice cream, and more as you fight through room after room of an evil corporation. But beware, for every upgrade you get, the enemies get stronger as well!

Fight through room after room full of strange robots, as you travel through offices, utility rooms, executive lounges, and more. You'll fight a vast array of smart-appliances and devices turned evil, from swarming staplers to violent vacuums to erratic lava lamps.

After each fight, Amy gets a chance to upgrade her weaponry. Will you take down robots with Sparkly Boots and a Semi-Automatic Chicken? Or perhaps you’re more of a Magnetic Flower + Quantum Ice Cream person?

At the end of each room, the robots ALSO get several random upgrades! Amy has the ability to sabotage the system and prevent these, but for each upgrade she disables, the facility's overall security level increases. Plan cleverly to limit the robots' resources effectively.

Meet a host of colorful characters to help or hinder you on your journey, as their personal aspirations interweave with Amy’s quest. Why are some robots so willing to help you? Why is everyone so cagey about that one file? And IS IT TIME TO BIZNESS??

FEATURES

  • A variety of thrilling worlds to explore, each with their own unique challenges and bots

  • Fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter action

  • Upgrades that can be mixed and matched

  • Plenty of memorable NPCs to chat with and befriend

  • Persistent upgrades to make you stronger each run

name: Amy Hates Robots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Graphics: DX10+

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: In this action roguelite, fight through room after room of an evil robot corporation, stacking abilities in wild combos like sparkly semi-automatic quantum ice cream or violent pneumatic chicken. But beware, every time you get an upgrade, the robots get stronger as well!
